org.jetel.connection.jdbc.specific.conn

Class BasicSqlConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.specific.conn.BasicSqlConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.sql.Connection, java.sql.Wrapper, SqlConnection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DB2Connection, DerbyConnection, ExasolConnection, FirebirdConnection, GenericODBCConnection, HiveConnection, MSSQLConnection, MySQLConnection, OracleConnection, PervasiveConnection, PostgreConnection, SQLiteConnection, SybaseConnection, VerticaConnection

    public class BasicSqlConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements SqlConnection
    Default adapter for common java.sql.Connection class It is directly used by the DefaultJdbcSpecific or as a ascendant of other Connection implementation.
